about_the_game:
This game adopts a preemptive experience mode, and due to an error in the release process, it cannot be rolled back to the official "preemptive experience" release type.

·Why adopt the preemptive experience model?
Rearea is a game dedicated to innovation, with sandbox based gameplay. We will continuously iterate and update it, adding new elements and gameplay. In the future, free tool programs will also be launched, allowing players to easily create and publish creative workshop works using our new technology. However, at this stage, we have to use a preemptive experience to launch Rearea in advance because the production team's production capacity is currently too low and requires a sum of funds to recruit talented individuals.
·How long does the preemptive experience state of this game last approximately?
We expect to release the official version before 2025, and before that, we will continue to update the beta version of Rearea, each version bringing players a brand new experience.
·How much is the difference between the planned full version and the preemptive experience version?
The official version of Rearea will have more complete details and content, more gameplay, and features such as achievement system and remote online will be added. But you may no longer be able to experience the content that has been removed and changed from the beta version (it will be interesting to chat with other players about the strange stories and strange stories of the beta version as an older generation in the future).
·What is the current situation of the preemptive experience version?
The game is currently under development, and players can experience some of the gameplay. The text language currently only supports Chinese, and we will improve support for other languages as soon as possible.
·Will there be any difference in game prices during and after the preemptive experience?
As the game content increases, prices may rise, but we have not yet decided on this.
·How do you plan to involve the player community in the development process?
We want Rearea to become a game customized by players, so we will refer to the valuable suggestions of each player, so that everyone can also participate in the game's production. Whether it's bug reporting or inspiration sharing, we will take it seriously.
Players can access the Steam community, Instagram，BiliBili， Communicate with us through email and other means to provide suggestions, and then we will improve and add more contact information.

Game Experience Overview



·You can play this game side by side with other players on the same screen, and share your new discoveries with your companions in real-time!

·Leisure, fun, relaxed and full of unknown gaming experiences, with a simple and cute pure hand drawn game art style, suitable for players of all ages and genders. Share this wonderful gaming time with your family, brothers, friends, boyfriend/girlfriend, and children! (Of course, it can also be played alone)

·Highly customizable game content, character underwear and jackets, structural combinations of tools and props, and even the world's blueprint can be freely modified.

·Highly random game content, every time you wake up, you will face a brand new world and environment. What different adventures await you?

·Highly casual game content, even if wandering around or hanging up, your "automation industry chain" will help you continuously obtain resources and "economy".

In game includes



·With the continuous development and evolution of economic growth, territories and facilities.

·How many interesting ecological environments can you find if they mix together to create new unknown environments?

·There are a wide variety of wild animals, and you can bring them back to your territory and tame them.

·A plethora of randomly generated buildings and treasure chests, perhaps even wandering around can yield great rewards.

·Rich challenges and battles, such as defeating thieves who come to steal the economy at night.

·Rich clothing, equipment, props, and materials, share your fashion show with your companions.

·More content is all within the game, come and explore!
